channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Amol Rajan Goes to the Ganges
channel.desc: Amol sets off to India on a pilgrimage to the largest religious festival in history, the Kumbh Mela, where he wants to find out if faith can help heal the grief of losing his father.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Ten
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Kim Kardashian Diamond Heist
channel.desc: Insiders give new and exclusive details of Kim Kardashian's robbery when she was held at gunpoint in Paris. One of the robbers, a victim who was inside Kim's hotel room, and a key investigator speak out for the first time.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Apples Never Fall
channel.desc: Joy and Stan Delaney find that retirement isn't what they hoped until a mysterious visitor arrives; when Joy later goes missing, her children wonder if foul play is involved.
